usercssData.name: Messenger Dark

ic-2.label: Custom icon filter
ic-2.name: ic-2
ic-2.default: invert(79%) sepia(2%) saturate(19%) hue-rotate(325deg) brightness(89%) contrast(81%)

ac-2.label: Custom accent filter
ac-2.name: ac-2
ac-2.default: invert(50%) sepia(94%) saturate(3979%) hue-rotate(183deg) brightness(104%) contrast(103%)

author: reizumi
description: A dark theme for Facebook Messenger.
name: Messenger Dark

usercssData.name: Clean Bing homepage
usercssData.description: Cleans up the Bing homepage by hiding everything except for the background and search bar (can optionally also keep Bing logo and wallpaper-related UI elements and show hidden elements when hovering over them)
usercssData.author: Marco Benzoni <hello@qlcvea.com> (http://qlcvea.com)

showHeaderOnHover.label: Show header when hovering over it
showHeaderOnHover.name: showHeaderOnHover

showBottomRowOnHover.label: Show footer and news when hovering at the bottom
showBottomRowOnHover.name: showBottomRowOnHover

author: Marco Benzoni <hello@qlcvea.com> (http://qlcvea.com)
description: Cleans up the Bing homepage by hiding everything except for the background and search bar (can optionally also keep Bing logo and wallpaper-related UI elements and show hidden elements when hovering over them)
name: Clean Bing homepage
